typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		F5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisaation
source(output(
		Mois_Selection as string,
		Code_depot as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		ca_avoir as string,
		yearmonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Avoir
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		fact_filter as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		cout_standard_cd_ as string,
		cout_fabrication as string,
		cout_standard_livr_ as string,
		cout_standard_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Facturation
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtarctionSAP
source(output(
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		DR as string,
		{Code postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> REFATC
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Offre
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> articleInput
source(output(
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Ville as string,
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputEPS
Avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		reference = NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectAvoir
Facturation, organisaation join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerfacturationOrganisation
setHubsID filter(toDouble(Qte_Validee_VGF)>0) ~> FilterQte
FilterQte derive(Mois = toInteger(Mois),
		{Année} = toInteger({Année}),
		canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP",     iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC")),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+"0"+Mois  )) ~> typeCast
dropColumns derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45,     iif(canal=="FS", 51,     iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		tOrigin = "avoir") ~> mapCanalID
month select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString = {Récept. de march.},
		reference = Article,
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		tOrigin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> efacturation
mapCanalID, efacturation join(dropColumns@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& {Année} == toInteger(year)
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& dropColumns@reference == efacturation@reference,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> inner
InnerfacturationOrganisation derive(month = right(yearmonth, 2),
		tOrigin = "facturation") ~> month
mapCanalID, efacturation join({Année} == toInteger(year)
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& dropColumns@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& dropColumns@reference == efacturation@reference,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeft
mapCanalID, efacturation join(dropColumns@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& dropColumns@reference == efacturation@reference
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& {Année} == toInteger(year),
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullRight
typeCast select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		reference,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
fullLeft filter(isNull(efacturation@tOrigin)) ~> left
left derive(data_origin = "avoir",
		id_canal_final = toString(id_canal_final)) ~> dataOriginAvoir
dataOriginAvoir select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference = dropColumns@reference,
		qt_final = Qte_Validee_VGF,
		POSSAMidString = NoCli,
		ca_final = PA_Valide_VGF,
		HubSAPid = dropColumns@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = dropColumns@yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
fullRight filter(isNull(mapCanalID@tOrigin)) ~> right
right select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final = {Canal distribution},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString,
		reference = efacturation@reference,
		yearmonth = efacturation@yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = efacturation@HubSAPid,
		qt_final = {Qté facturée},
		ca_final = {CA facturé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameColumns
renameColumns derive(data_origin = "facturation") ~> dataOriginFacturation
inner select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference = dropColumns@reference,
		qt_final = Qte_Validee_VGF,
		ca_final = PA_Valide_VGF,
		HubSAPid = dropColumns@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = dropColumns@yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		marque_id,
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d ordre} = {Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameColumns1
renameColumns1 aggregate(groupBy(reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid),
	ca_final = first(ca_final),
		NoOffre = max(NoOffre),
		qt_final = max(qt_final),
		canal = max(canal),
		id_canal_final = max(id_canal_final),
		{ATC Corrigé} = max({ATC Corrigé}),
		marque_id = max(marque_id),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		{Donneur d ordre} = max({Donneur d ordre})) ~> getUnique
dataOriginFacturationAvoir select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		NoOffre,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endInner
getUnique derive(data_origin = "facturation avoir") ~> dataOriginFacturationAvoir
dataOriginFacturation select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d ordre} = {Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endRight
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference,
		marque_id,
		qt_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		ca_final,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endLeft
typeCastCanal, endRight union(byName: true)~> unionFacturation
unionFacturation, endLeft union(byName: true)~> unionAvoir
distributeur select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDerementaiton
endInner derive(id_canal_final = toString(id_canal_final)) ~> typeCastCanal
Select1 aggregate(groupBy({Canal final},
		Marque,
		code_postal_atc),
	Matricule = max(Matricule),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		ATC = max(ATC)) ~> Agregat
Agregat select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectcolonneATC
Offre select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		{Quantité},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		ATC = CodeATC,
		Canal,
		Produit,
		{Créateur offre}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColonneOffre
SelectColonneOffre aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		Canal,
		ATC),
	DateOffre = first(DateOffre)) ~> AgregatOffreCanalATC
AgregatOffreCanalATC select(mapColumn(
		Offre,
		canal = Canal,
		{ATC performance} = ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOffre
endDerementaiton derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final=="43", "Chantier",  "Diffus")) ~> canalfinal
ExtarctionSAP select(mapColumn(
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{Téléphone 1},
		{Numéro de télécopie},
		{Org. commerciale}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSAP
canalfinal, SelectSAP join(toInteger(POSSAMidString) == toInteger(Client)
	&& toInteger(marque_id) == toInteger({Org. commerciale}),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSAP
DerivedColumn1 derive(marque_name = iif(marque_id=="1604", 'SaunierDuval', 'Vaillant'),
		distributeur = "van markes") ~> marqueNamee
marqueNamee select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre,
		canal_final,
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client = SelectSAP@Client,
		{Téléphone 1},
		{Numéro de télécopie},
		{Org. commerciale},
		marque_name,
		distributeur,
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCol
SelectCol, SelectcolonneATC join(canal_final == {Canal final}
	&& {Code postal} == code_postal_atc
	&& marque_name == Marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinATC
Join1 derive(data_origin = "avoir") ~> addDataorigin
JoinATC select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre,
		canal_final,
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{Org. commerciale},
		marque_name,
		distributeur,
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameATC
RenameATC, SelectOffre join(NoOffre == Offre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOffre
JoinOffre select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		data_origin,
		no_offre = NoOffre,
		canal_final,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		distributeur,
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC,
		Offre,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameNoOffre
unionAvoir derive(distributeur = "Van Markes") ~> distributeur
selectAvoir filter(CompanyId=="11") ~> filtreCompany
filtreCompany derive(HubSAPid = "16004028") ~> setHubsID
REFATC select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		{Plan primes},
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		code_postal_atc = {Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
articleInput select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = OrgCm,
		article = Article
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endArticle
dropColumnsInCommon, endArticle join(reference == article,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
inputEPS select(mapColumn(
		client = {Numéro du compte},
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endEPS
addDataorigin, endEPS join(POSSAMidString == client,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
JoinSAP, endEPS join(toInteger(POSSAMidString) == toInteger(endEPS@client),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 derive({Code postal} = coalesce(SelectSAP@{Code postal},endEPS@{Code postal})) ~> DerivedColumn1
renameNoOffre sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['SinkVanMarkes'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkVanMarkes

source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as integer,
		{Code Postal fin} as integer,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		{ID SAP} as string,
		{Diffus/Chantier} as string,
		{Plan prime} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> atcJoined
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC = {ID SAP},
		NomATC = Utilisateur,
		{Plan primes} = {Plan prime},
		Matricule = {ID SAP},
		DR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renamle
renamle derive({Canal final} = iif( in(["Vaillant diffus","SD diffus",'Diffus'], {Plan primes}), "Diffus" ,"Chantier" ),
		toreplicate = {Code Postal fin}-{Code Postal début}+1) ~> canalFinal
canalFinal filter({Code Postal début}<= {Code Postal fin}) ~> filtreCodePostal
filtreCodePostal derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index)) ~> dd
dd foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC,
		NomATC = Utilisateur,
		{Plan primes},
		Matricule = ATC,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		DR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> dd1
dd1 derive({Code postal} = {Code Postal début}+dd) ~> codePostalUpdate
atcJoined derive({ID SAP} = toInteger({ID SAP})) ~> DerivedColumn1
canalFinal filter(ATC==16400015) ~> Filter1
renamle filter(ATC==16400015) ~> Filter3
codePostalUpdate filter(in(['Attaché commercial prescription','Attaché commercial réseau 2','Attaché commercial réseau' ], Fonction)) ~> Filter4
codePostalUpdate filter(in(['Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique' ,'Conseiller technique régional'], Fonction)) ~> Filter5
Filter5 select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		IDSAP = ATC,
		Nom = NomATC,
		{Plan primes},
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		DR,
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Filter4 filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> Filter6
Filter6 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['referentiel_atc.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AtcprepareForReplicate
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SAUNIER DUVAL} as string,
		{208.0} as string,
		{Pièces détachées pour chauffage} as string,
		{05608600} as string,
		{5272.0} as string,
		{33.0} as string,
		{0.0} as string,
		{202008} as string,
		{2020} as string,
		{08} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['referentiel_CTRCTT.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

properties.description:
o	Pour le cout
	Prendre la facturation « brute » en sortie de SAP/BW
	Filtrer les lignes ou le donneur d’ordre est un CTT
•	Question 2bis (cf plus haut) : il semblerait que nous ayons besoin ID du CTT ?
	Filtrer certaines raisons de commandes et de types de document
•	Question 3 : pouvez-vous nous transmettre le détail des filtres svp ?
	La colonne de cout en sortie sera le « cout standard » présent dans la facturation 
	Ajouter l’information de VMC (en euros) en faisant la jointure en avec le nouveau référentiel VMC (info non dispo dans l’extract à date BW)
	Ajouter les méta données produits, client, CTT, comme dans la base commerciale

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputFacturation
inputFacturation select(mapColumn(
		{Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		Article,
		{Type doc. vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MarketingCout.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		{ID SAP} as string,
		{Lancement Maj Affectation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> refaffectation
Select2 derive(Utilisateur = Utilisateur) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		DR,
		{ID SAP}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filteredcolumnsrefrefaffectation
filteredcolumnsrefrefaffectation derive({Plan prime} = iif( Fonction== "Attaché commercial réseau" || Fonction == "Attaché commercial réseau 2" , "Diffus", iif( Fonction == "Attaché commercial prescription"  , "Chantier", ""  )  )) ~> DerivedColumn3
Filter2 select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		DR,
		{ID SAP}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
refaffectation filter(in(['Attaché commercial prescription','Attaché commercial réseau 2','Attaché commercial réseau' ,'Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique' ,'Conseiller technique régional'], Fonction)) ~> Filter2
Filter2 filter({ID SAP}=="16400015") ~> Filter3
DerivedColumn3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['atc_affectation_lower.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> atcAffectationLower
